name: TOD - Tower of Directions
description:
Please welcome my first minigame, made with unity; Tower of Directions. A game where you have to shoot the enemies coming from different paths. Game difficulty is rapidly increasing, try not to get dizzy! :)

Controls: 

  • WASD to shoot
  • Space/rShift to reach flying enemies
  • Control to reach underground enemies

The game is in development, the core game mechanic is mainly complete, missing audio and more visuals, unfortunately I wont have too much time to work on it in the near future, that's why I release it at this stage.
